alice.tucson.service.tools

Class CLIAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • alice.util.Automaton
      • alice.tucson.service.tools.CLIAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class CLIAgent
extends Automaton
    Command Line Interpreter TuCSoN agent. Waits for user input, properly parses the issued command, then process it calling the corresponding method on the ACC (gained through constructor). It blocks until TuCSoN reply comes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
